galahr 0.1.0

Reference

Main functionalities

galahr

galahr: A GUI to assist learning about high dimensions in R

launchApp()

Shiny app for exploring high dimensional data

Plotting

coveragePlot()

Generating the coverage display.

ggtimeline()

Generating the timeline display.

plotly1d()

Generating the plotly 1-d parameter display.

plotlyAxesF()

Generating the plotly axes display.

plotlyTourF()

Generating the plotly tour display.

plotlyTourGrouped()

Generating the plotly tour display for grouped data.

Data

GW170817

Posterior samples fitting a gravitational wave observation.

galah

Scatter points containing a galah.

tsfeatureData

Features calculated on different types of time series.

Helper functions

centerAll()

Combined centering for projected data and cube points

cubePoints()

Generate vertices on hypercube enclosing all data points.

dcorIndex()

Distance correlation based tour index

formatProj()

Formatting projection matrix for screen printout.

fullTourPCA()

PCA over the projection vectors in the tour sequence.

getGuidedTour()

Taking guided tour index name and returning corresponding guided tour

getPathIndex()

Taking interpolated tour path and index name and returning path index

mineIndex()

MINE based tour index

scags()

Scagnostics based tour index

splineIndex()

Spline based tour index
